channel.title: Admin only items and specs
channel.description:
Well Basically
I want to know how to make items Admin only
and i need to know how come P'Ring command is under admins but it doesnt work so i want to know
how to make it so somet hings are like admins only and the command can be done by admins and they can
wear the item
Also
i want to know how to put in special to like D long and stuff cause i only have it on whip and i want to know
how to put unlimited spec to =D Thanks!

item.title: Admin only items and specs
item.dc:creator: @Bradyfan Bradyfan
item.description:
@Bradyfan wrote:

mmk thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 08:09:58 PM[/size][hr]public void maulSpec()
{
if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153)
{
setAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 4;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(30);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else
if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4153)
{
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
SpecDamg(30);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
startAnimation(1667);
actionTimer = 4;

So where would i put it im really stuck

im not perfect at this stuff do i just put it anywhere or in a specific spot? and wats taking away spec bar?

Read full topic

item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

for specs try
if(playerRights < 3){specialAmount -= 25;}
and for admin only items search getclattack
i wont let you C&P here because you wouldnt learn anything, but ill hint a lil
GetClRights
explore, see what clattack leads to n stuff
